darkstat ntop and probably few others; 'apt-cache search monitor bandwidth' 'apt-cache search network usage'
these tools will allow me to monitor also the bandwidth of the other machines on the network? because i tried ntop and tcptrack they allow only to monitor my local interfaces on my comuter
